topic.title: Locating and Editing the Console Configuration File

body.p: The Eucalyptus Console configuration settings are stored in the console.ini file.
For Centos and RHEL installations from packages, this file is located in /etc/eucalyptus-console/console.ini.
For Ubuntu installations from packages, this file is located in /opt/euca-console/console.ini.
For installations from source, this file is in <your-git-directory>/eucalyptus-console/console.ini
